Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: pharon rodgers "slow down"
Reviews.Content: I purchase this phone for my wife, close to a year ago. She called me and stated she dropped her phone in the toilet (no folks, it was before use). I told her not to turn the phone on (too late). She had done the unthinkable. I just knew I would be coughing up a few hundred dollars. So, I told her to remove the battery, leave the cover off, attempt to gently dry what you can, lay the phone on it's back, wait 3-4 days and put it back together. People the phone works. All functions are a go! Samsung G600, I'll call on you anytime.

Reviews.Title: Incredible
Reviews.Author: Ivan Rivas "scubapilot"
Reviews.Content: This is the best phone I've had, It is really usefull, with an excelent camera, takes videos, voice recorder, etc.  But being unlocked is a nice feature, because I travel a lot and can use it with a US service or at central america, etc.  Good screen, lots of contacts, bluetooth and, of course, easy to use.  Very recomendable cell phone.....

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: Carlos Guerrero
Reviews.Content: Good phone, slim, easy to carry ... Does not weigh much and is slider ...!! 5Mp Camera are good attributes for a good price ...!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
5 Megapixel Camera, with autofocus, flash, and IS
QuadBand GSM support: 850/900/1800/1900MHz
Stereo FM Radio, and TV out
Bluetooth Printing and Document viewer (Word, Excel, Powerpoint, PDF)
EDGE, Bluetooth 2.0 with A2DP
ProductInfo.Name: SAMSUNG G600, 5MP CAMERA PHONE, (UNLOCKED QUADBAND)
